description:
Ginta and Hakkaku fight with Koga over something small, and end up working separately from him. As they do, they meet Sesshomaru`s group.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Koga y Sesshomaru: un enfrentamiento peligroso
Kouga e Sesshoumaru! Um perigoso confronto!
Kouga to Sesshoumaru Kiken na Souguu
Sesshomaru and Koga: A Dangerous Encounter
Sesshomaru und der Herr der Wölfe
鋼牙と殺生丸危険な遭遇
